reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always a WIN.
reviews.reviewText: Love it because, it's easy to use and easy to clean. it also cooks more efficiently than my last air fryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The perfect size for me and work well. Love the color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy this air fryer because I wasn't familiar with the brand. I used to have a name brand air fryer and it died some time ago and I wasn't sure I needed to replace it because I wasn't using it much. I finally decided to try this one because of it's size and price. It's a perfect size for feeding 1 or 2 people. I also like the color. It's a big bigger than I had imagined before it arrived but it fits fine on my counter. This air fryer is easy to use and even easier to clean up; the non-stick interior just wipes right up. I still don't use an air fryer a lot on my whole food plant-based diet but I'm glad I got it. I think the price was reasonable and if you are looking for an air fryer, I highly recommend this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and quick
reviews.reviewText: I love my air fryer! As someone who lives alone and is a not a foodie, nor likes too cook, I had wanted an air fryer for awhile, but was worried it would fall by the wayside like my onepot and other cooking tools I bought thinking “if I have this, I’ll start cooking”. Ha!The cycle was broken on this one. I love it to cook and reheat. It is easy to use and clean and I love that it takes way less time to cook things, part of why I hate cooking. In fact, it took me awhile to figure out chicken breasts b/c I kept overcooking it. Potatoes and veggies are so much quicker to make.Two main complaints, which aren’t deal breakers. I wish it had more instructions on how long to cook things. There are settings etched in the cooker, but it’s missing some basics. Also, It is kind of small. I am one person, so it works okay, but if you are cooking a lot, you may want it bigger. I try and leave space for the air to come through, but you can also overlap a little in things like veggies. You can also use with tinfoil. It works like an oven which I love in the summer because it keeps my kitchen from getting too hot since I don’t have an a/c unit in my kitchen.I recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase no regrets!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m SO happy I got it I use it everyday pretty much. It changed my life. What a good product. I LOVE the color makes me so happy looking at it on my counter it’s so pretty lol. And cooks SOO WELL. I was worried I wasn’t even going to use it that much but here I am using it daily and depending on it now for eating more real foods. I was eating stupid stuff before that didn’t feel like real food, such as chips and stupid stuff. Now im able to actually cook warm meals. And it’s piece of cake washing it just put the tray and the metal piece inside the dishwasher and done!. It was worth every penny

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is so pretty and very great quality
reviews.reviewText: Extremely good air fryer!Color is such a nice turquoise and the functions of this air fryer is so good. It comes with a recipe book and pre set time/temperature for specific foods if you need but it can also be adjusted exactly to how you want!
